Text: Just downloaded, and it seems it doesnt work on my ps3.. which its weird as normally 3Li movies works on consoles... :(

Same here. Plays perfectly fine on my PC (in fact, it looks great!), but it will not play on my PS3. It shows as "corrupted data" in the list under Video.

I'm not sure what's wrong with it as I was trying to find conversion software (free) that would make it compatible with the PS3 without losing too much quality, but couldn't find anything. Tried Red Kawa PS3 Video 9 but it couldn't even open the file.

Tried 4Media PS3 Converter 6 and it seems like it may do the job but the trial only converts 3 minutes and quits (unless you pay the $30 or so for it).

Looked at Handbrake and it seems to read the file but I don't know if it will convert it properly. Started the encoding process and it says it will take 7 hours!!! Forget that noise...going to download a lower quality file from TPB that hopefully works.

I hate this damn file incompatibility crap.
